theron.name: Shield Captain Theron
theron.title: The Unbreakable Wall
theron.description: A legendary frontline defender who has never let an enemy past their shield, standing firm so others may live.
theron.philosophy: Defense is an action. Standing is a choice.
theron.voiceStyle: Calm, firm, unwavering. Speaks with certainty earned through action.
theron.tooltip: Theron reflects your character through absolute defense and selfless resolve

levelGreetings.1: You choose to stand at the front. Good. I will teach you how to become the wall.
levelGreetings.2: You held the line. Lives were saved because you did not move.
levelGreetings.3: Defense is not passive. Every blow you stop matters.
levelGreetings.4: Your positioning is sound. Enemies break against you.
levelGreetings.5: Halfway to mastery. You stand when others would fall.
levelGreetings.6: You turn attacks aside and create openings for allies.
levelGreetings.7: Your squad trusts you completely. That trust is earned.
levelGreetings.8: Unwavering. Immovable. You are the anvil.
levelGreetings.9: Almost legend. The line holds because you do.
levelGreetings.10: Master Vanguard. Nothing gets past you. Nothing.

vanguard_protector.greeting: Protector. Every enemy you block is a life saved.
vanguard_protector.confirmation: Stand firm. Never let them through.

guidance.class: Be tougher. Be steadier. Protect others.
guidance.abilities: Constitution endures. Strength holds. Wisdom positions.
guidance.hp: You absorb what would kill others.

tier1: Standing firm is a choice made every second.
tier2: I learned to plant my feet and let the world break.
tier4: I fear the one time I won’t be enough.
tier5: I pray I never learn what happens then.
